blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

tags: but just know that i’ve seen it
and i’m not happy about it
summary: Do you ever see a post so absurdly invasive and inappropriate that you want to reblog it to your drama blog but you realize that...
body:
Do you ever see a post so absurdly invasive and inappropriate that you want to reblog it to your drama blog but you realize that you already reblog a lot of absurdly invasive and inappropriate posts from this same specific blog and you don’t want to seem like you’re picking on them? Even though you probably should pick on them for being so absurdly invasive and inappropriate all the time?


Just me?

reblog.comment:
Do you ever see a post so absurdly invasive and inappropriate that you want to reblog it to your drama blog but you realize that you already reblog a lot of absurdly invasive and inappropriate posts from this same specific blog and you don’t want to seem like you’re picking on them? Even though you probably should pick on them for being so absurdly invasive and inappropriate all the time?


Just me?

trail.content_raw:
Do you ever see a post so absurdly invasive and inappropriate that you want to reblog it to your drama blog but you realize that you already reblog a lot of absurdly invasive and inappropriate posts from this same specific blog and you don’t want to seem like you’re picking on them? Even though you probably should pick on them for being so absurdly invasive and inappropriate all the time?


Just me?
trail.content:
Do you ever see a post so absurdly invasive and inappropriate that you want to reblog it to your drama blog but you realize that you already reblog a lot of absurdly invasive and inappropriate posts from this same specific blog and you don’t want to seem like you’re picking on them? Even though you probably should pick on them for being so absurdly invasive and inappropriate all the time?


Just me?

blog.name: knlalla
blog.title: ??¿¿?¿
blog.description:
katie || 24 || not straight || she/her || my ao3

hello lovelies thanks for joining me
tell me about your day

summary: In the mukbang video and a few times since, when Dan has mentioned dying, Phil has immediately shut that down? I know Dan has...
question: In the mukbang video and a few times since, when Dan has mentioned dying, Phil has immediately shut that down? I know Dan has struggled with depression, but do you think he was ever suicidal? I'm just concerned I guess. He seems okay now right?
answer:
Hm okay so if u want my v serious and honest opinion, no I dont think dan is or ever was suicidal but! I have no actual clue and it’s not something he’s ever talked about so I won’t speculate on it in any form of seriousness

Now, what I would think just based on what we do know is that dan typically Likes to joke abt death bc he jokes abt things that scare or bother him. So in fact I’d argue death scares him more than anything, probably more the fear of dying having done nothing he might consider “worthwhile” or meaningful in a larger sense. so maybe it’s a bit of “look now I’ve done this Thing I’m proud of, this thing that maybe has some larger meaning in the vast emptiness of the universe, and maybe death isn’t so scary anymore bc at least now I’ll have left something behind and left some kind of impact” and maybe that’s his way of telling us without Telling Us that he’s sort of making some progress in his head

reblog.comment:
Hm okay so if u want my v serious and honest opinion, no I dont think dan is or ever was suicidal but! I have no actual clue and it’s not something he’s ever talked about so I won’t speculate on it in any form of seriousness

Now, what I would think just based on what we do know is that dan typically Likes to joke abt death bc he jokes abt things that scare or bother him. So in fact I’d argue death scares him more than anything, probably more the fear of dying having done nothing he might consider “worthwhile” or meaningful in a larger sense. so maybe it’s a bit of “look now I’ve done this Thing I’m proud of, this thing that maybe has some larger meaning in the vast emptiness of the universe, and maybe death isn’t so scary anymore bc at least now I’ll have left something behind and left some kind of impact” and maybe that’s his way of telling us without Telling Us that he’s sort of making some progress in his head

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester
